item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-05
item.description: Alphabet is launching a company that uses AI for drug discovery (3 minute read) Isomorphic Laboratories is a new company from Alphabet that will use artificial intelligence for drug discovery.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-29
item.description: Hereâ€™s everything Amazon just announced: A home robot named Astro, a fitness band and more (6 minute read) Amazon just announced a bunch of new gadgets ahead of the busy holiday shopping season.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-01
item.description: Amazon’s Prime Air can officially begin drone delivery trials in the US (2 minute read) Amazon has officially become an air carrier, with the Federal Aviation Administration granting Amazon Prime Air approval to begin its first commercial delivery trials in the US.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-29
item.description: Apple threatens to remove Airbnb from App Store over virtual experiences commission (2 minute read) Apple has demanded a 30% commission for sales of online classes sold by Airbnb and ClassPass.
